title: Hasidic School to Pay $8 Million After Admitting to Widespread Fraud
description: The Central United Talmudical Academy, which operates the largest all-boys yeshiva in New York State, acknowledged illegally diverting money from federal food aid and other programs.
dc:creator: Brian M. Rosenthal and Eliza Shapiro
media:credit: Jonah Markowitz for The New York Times
media:description: The operators of the Central United Talmudical Academy in Brooklyn admitted in federal court to diverting government money in a wide-ranging fraud.
